562370.name: TS Marketplace: Chatham Main Line Scenario Pack 01 Add-On
562370.description:
The Chatham Mainline Scenario Pack includes 10 challenging and enjoyable scenarios for the Chatham Mainline Route on Steam, covering passenger operations in this busy commuter route.

Take the driving seat of the First Capital Connect Class 319 EMU Add-On, Class 375 and Class 465 both to haul passenger services along the line following real world timetables with real-world difficulties from poor weather to broken signals in a commuter hotspot.

Note:

To drive all 10 career scenarios in the pack, players will require Chatham Main Line - London-Gillingham Route Add-On (available separately) and select scenarios also individually require Train Simulator’s First Capital Connect Class 319 EMU Add-On.

Included Scenarios

The Chatham Mainline Scenario Pack Add-on includes ten operating challenges in career scenario for the Chatham Main Line - London-Gillingham Route (Available Separately):

Requiring Chatham Main Line - London-Gillingham Route and First Capital Connect Class 319 EMU:

  • Cheaper Travel
  • Food & Wine
  • Heading Home
  • Diversion
  • Morning Commuter Train
  • Sleeping In
  • Stopping Service
  • Thameslink Trouble
  • The Bitter Cold
